body.name: Blue Diamond Cookware Diamond Infused Ceramic Nonstick 8" Frying Pan Skillet, PFAS-Free, Dishwasher Safe, Oven Safe, Blue
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 33 mins
features: 5X HARDER COATING & 10X LONGER LASTING: Our diamond-infused coating delivers 5x more strength and lasts 10x longer than conventional coatings, metal utensil safe
4X BETTER HEAT TRANSFER: Our pans heat up super quickly and evenly to save you time and energy. Say goodbye to cold or hot spots with the incredible heat transfer of Blue Diamond
TOXIN-FREE: This collection’s healthy ceramic nonstick coating is free of PFAS, PFOA, lead, and cadmium
TOUGH ALUMINUM BODIES: The durable aluminum construction offers extreme strength with quick and even heating every single time
WARP CONTROL BASE: Featuring a heavy-duty forged base, these extremely tough pans will tackle countless meals without warping, wobbling, or degrading over time
ERGONOMIC HANDLES: This set’s riveted stainless steel handles offer a sturdy, comfortable grip built for oven cooking
BUILT FOR OVEN COOKING: Oven and broiler safe up to 600°F and suitable for all stovetops, except induction
EASY TO CLEAN: These pans are dishwasher safe for easy cleanup, but most messes will wipe clean
body.description: Experience high performance cookware featuring the latest and greatest cooking technology! This 8” frying pan is the perfect way to conquer smaller meals with ease. Blue Diamond’s ceramic nonstick coating is infused with diamonds for remarkable strength and durability while delivering a shine that lasts a lifetime. As the leaders in nonstick, Blue Diamond’s ceramic coating is free of PFAS, PFOA, lead, and cadmium so you can craft daily meals without releasing any toxic fumes. This small but mighty pan is crafted from durable aluminum for quick and even heating with a heavy-duty forged base that prevents warping, wobbling, or degrading over time. This frying pan is also oven and broiler safe up to 600F (lids up to 425F) with riveted stainless steel handles for a sturdy grip. Dishwasher safe for easy cleanup.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BLUE DIAMOND ENHANCED CERAMIC NONSTICK 8" FRYPAN

THE NEW STANDARD IN NONSTICK! BLUE DIAMOND COOKWARE Want a nonstick pan that can standup to daily life? The secret is the diamond-enhanced design. Blue Diamond`s nonstick coating is 5X harder, 4X faster, and 10X longer lasting than traditional nonstick coatings. It`s even metal utensil safe and toxin-free (free of PFAS, PFOA, lead & cadmium), so you can cook without worry. It’s the easiest cookware you’ll ever use!
SEE BLUE DIAMOND IN ACTION! THE NEWEST STANDARD IN NONSTICK, TOXIN-FREE COOKWARE!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This pan is amazing!
reviews.reviewText: I have been through many pans and this one is hands down the best one on the market. The quality& design gives you cullinaty results. It’s the #1 pan on the market! It’s scratch resistant, nonstick, lightweight, oven , broiler & dishwasher safe. It’s flawless!! If you don’t own one get you one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The Blue Diamond Cookware Diamond Infused Ceramic Nonstick 12" Frying Pan Skillet has truly been a game-changer in my kitchen. This beautiful blue skillet not only adds a pop of color but also delivers exceptional performance.From the moment I started using it, I was impressed by its nonstick surface. I could cook with minimal oil, and nothing stuck to the pan. It made cooking and cleaning up a breeze. Plus, knowing that it's PFAS-free gave me peace of mind, knowing that my family's health was a priority.What I love most about this skillet is its versatility. I could use it on the stovetop to sear meats perfectly, and it also performed flawlessly in the oven. It's truly an all-in-one solution for various cooking needs.The durability of the Blue Diamond Cookware skillet is another highlight. It has held up beautifully over time, showing no signs of wear and tear. And the fact that it's dishwasher safe makes cleanup even easier.In summary, the Blue Diamond Cookware Diamond Infused Ceramic Nonstick 12" Frying Pan Skillet has become an essential tool in my kitchen. Its performance, versatility, and durability have won me over, and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. If you're looking for a top-notch frying pan, this one is definitely worth considering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A cooking dream, but mine was apparently defective
reviews.reviewText: I wanted some nice pans that would make cooking easier so I bought a set of ceramic pans, but wanted a larger pan too so I purchased this 12 inch one. I would rather it came with a glass lid, but since it didn’t I purchased that as well. Cooking on these ceramic pans is like a dream come true with nothing sticking and easy cleanup. Food slides around so easily that I can flip things like a professional chef. Somehow, breakfast tastes better when cooking in these pans. Perhaps because I’m not having to scrap it off the bottom of the pan. However...Upon receiving the pan(s) the first thing I did was season it along with my full set. It then went into the cupboard. Each pan with it’s own lid. It sat in there for a month. Although I have used all the pans in the full set I purchased, I have never used this particular pan, but please keep reading. My rules for my pans are: • Do not go above medium heat • Silicone and wooden utensils only • Hand wash only with sponge – no scouring pads - not even plastic ones • Let pans cool before washing • No nesting the pans • Season pans once a monthI season by coating the pan with oil. Place it in a 300 degree oven for two minutes. Let the pan cool and wipe out the remaining oil. I feel the little bit of time this task takes was well worth it to keep the pans non stick ceramic coating from degrading.I went so far as to post a notice on the exhaust fan above the stove listing the rules for family members. Imagine my dismay when I went to season my pans for the second time only to find a chip in the ceramic coating and gouges along the rim of this pan – even though the pan has just been sitting in the cupboard with the lid sitting on top of it. Is it possible that the lid caused the gouges? Hard to believe the pan could be so easily susceptible to damage, but there is no way the lid can cause the chip in the ceramic coating as the lid can’t touch that spot. Note that there is PLENTY of room in this cupboard so the pans are not packed in there stacked on top of each other. Is this pan really so vulnerable that it becomes damaged just sitting in the cupboard?I’ve examined my other ceramic pans and have found no damage so I’m hoping I simply received a defective 12 inch pan and have arranged to receive a replacement. Not wanting to risk potential damage on the rim of the new pan, I have also ordered a new lid with a silicone rim. It will protect the rim of the pan. This should be unnecessary as the pan should be able to tolerate putting a lid on it without causing damage. Chips in the ceramic coating is another story. We’ll see what happens.Putting aside my negative experience with this particular pan, they are all great to cook with. The only issue might be the handle. It’s metal, but it’s hollow. This allows heat to travel up the handle more quickly than a solid handle. I haven’t had any problems with the handle getting too hot as others have had, but I do notice that the closer the handle is to the pan then the hotter it is. Sure, that’s normal, but this gets hotter quicker. As I said, I have not yet hat an issue with the handle getting to hot to handle, but as a precaution I also purchased silicone handle holders that are used like pot holders. So far I’ve only used them when removing the pan from the oven after seasoning. I recommend the silicone handle holders – whatever style fits your fancy – as they provide a better, safer and less awkward grip than cloth pot holders.I love this (these) pans and am so disappointed that this one turned out not to be very durable, but hopefully the replacement will fair better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Frying Pan Skillet!
reviews.reviewText: Really nice frying pan skillet! Super easy to clean, scratch resistant, no stick mess. Perfect for eggs, french toast, sandwiches, grilled cheese, etc. Perfect for a single person and single meals. Great frying pan! Hope to get another one a bit bigger for other cooking needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid construction. Non-stick is excellent.
reviews.reviewText: These pans are a good value for the price. Sturdy, thick, construction. I haven't had any problems with paint chipping, etc. Handles work well to disappate heat.The ceramic nonstick works very well. But, in my experience, the lifespan is not as long as with Teflon. But if you are trying to avoid PFAS, this is the next best thing.All ceramic nonstick I've bought (across several brands including GreenPan) all wear out in about a year (of almost daily use and hand washing). I've found cleaning with a soft sponge, not the scratchy side of a ScotchBrite or ScrubDaddy, will help prolong the life a little. But, even then, be prepared to buy new ones after 12-18 months or deal with some sticking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Never using any other brand!
reviews.reviewText: I have used this pan for everything at least twice a day since it arrived! Even and quick heating. First time not using oil or butter to cook an egg...it DID NOT STICK! Super easy to clean. Plus, it's a pretty blue. AND it came with a nice hefty lid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars From morning omelets to evening stir-fries
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Blue Diamond Non-Stick Pan. The most impressive feature is it distributes heat evenly for perfect cooking results. I've experienced no sticking issues, making it a breeze to clean. Overall, I highly recommend the Blue Diamond for anyone seeking a reliable, high-quality non-stick pan.
So far it works as advertised
This pan is oversized and awesome!Perfect size to make all the eggs, no more who's next
This cookwear is amazing. I am able to cook egg whites with no oil and they slide off the pan. Super easy clean up with just a quick rinse.
This cookwear is amazing. I am able to cook egg whites with no oil and they slide off the pan. Super easy clean up with just a quick rinse.

After 3 months of use, there are small chips and flakes on the edge of the pan. You know the top edge of the pan that surrounds the cooking surface?Otherwise, it's easy to clean and is very easy to cook on. Scrambled eggs have never been so care-free.
